name: B. Xenia and Ringroad
statement:
Xenia lives in a city that has houses built along the main ringroad. The
ringroad houses are numbered 1 through in the clockwise order. The
ringroad traffic is one way and also is clockwise.Xenia has recently
moved into the ringroad house number 1. As a result, she’s got things to
do. In order to complete the -th task, she needs to be in the house
number and complete all tasks with numbers less than . Initially, Xenia
is in the house number 1, find the minimum time she needs to complete
all her tasks if moving from a house to a neighboring one along the
ringroad takes one unit of time.
